newsitem.title: USA: Pittway Corp stake cut by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Pittway Corp stake cut by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Friday it cut its stake in Pittway Corp to 3,490,431 common shares or 20.55 percent from 21.57 percent.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net of 93,750 common sold between September 4 and October 29 at prices ranging from $44.1125 to $49.1250.

The Chicago-based company is a manufacturer and distributor of professional burgular and fire alarm equipment; a publisher of trade magazines and directories and a participant in a joint venture real estate development.
